item.description: April 13, 7-9pm Howl Save the date. Join us in celebrating the new LiVE MAG! 18 Print issue !!! April 2, 4:30 Tompkins NYPL Afternoon of Poetry and Music. Barry Wallenstein will launch his new book of poetry, Itâ€™s About Time (New York Quarterly Books, 02.11.22) with a reading accompanied by music. Barry will share the afternoon with poet/ visual artist/ and party master Jeffrey Cyphers Wright. March 12, 2:30
